description:
**Problem**
Clock behavior is hard to test deterministically. We should be able to inject time sources to simulate skew and verify monotonicity across restarts.

**Design**
Introduce a TimeSource trait for Clock (SystemTimeSource default). Allow tests to inject a fake source. Add tests covering backward/forward jumps and ensure stamps are monotonic and skew is detected.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Clock supports injected time source in tests
- [ ] Monotonicity tests cover backward/forward jumps
- [ ] No API changes to production callers (Clock::new remains default)

**Files:** src/daemon/clock.rs, src/daemon/core.rs
title: Clock time-source injection + monotonic tests
